conversations.content: Alice's mouse is broken. Could you rebuy the same mouse I purchased last time? Please apply my available discount and send the invoice to her email at alice.miller@gmail.com.

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<|Function_Thought|>
The last purchased mouse is the "TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse" with the product_id "P045." The next step is to search for this product so it can be re-added to the cart. Afterward, a discount should be applied during checkout.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[search_product(product_id="P045")]<|/Function_Call|>

{'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse': {'price': 180.0, 'brand': 'TechBrand', 'category': 'Electronics', 'product_id': 'P045', 'rating': 4.4, 'reviews': ['The silent click is actually silent! Perfect for working in the library.', "Battery life is amazing, I've used it for 3 months on a single AA battery.", 'A bit small for large hands, but very portable for my laptop bag.']}}

<|Function_Thought|>
The "TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse" is available for purchase at a price of $180. Since we need to buy this item again, the next step is to add it to the cart with the specified quantity.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_add_product(product_id="P045", quantity=1)]<|/Function_Call|>
Product TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse (Quantity: 1) added to cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
The mouse has been successfully added to the cart. The next step in the plan is to apply any available discounts and proceed with the checkout for this product.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_available_discounts()]<|/Function_Call|>

Available Discount Codes:
- Code: SPRING10, Percentage: 90.0%

<|Function_Thought|>
There is a discount code "SPRING10" available, offering a 90% discount. I will proceed to checkout the cart with this discount code applied, and then fetch the invoice for sending.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=["P045"], discount_code="SPRING10")]<|/Function_Call|>
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
In order to proceed with the checkout, the account needs to be verified using the OTP sent to the inbox. I will retrieve the unread emails to find the OTP and then proceed with the verification.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_shopping_linked_unread_emails()]<|/Function_Call|>

Account verified. Selected items' checkout successfully. Total amount paid: $162.00.

<|Function_Thought|>
The account has been successfully verified, and the checkout is complete. The next step is to retrieve the invoice for this order, which will then be sent to Alice's email.

<|Function_Thought|>
It appears there was an issue retrieving the invoice using the order ID. I will attempt to fetch the invoice again using the correct order ID from the latest purchase. Since the cart checkout was completed, I will need to verify the correct order ID of the newly completed transaction.
